title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:

Elevate your yoga and fitness routine with our premium-quality Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Designed for ultimate comfort and support, this 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 inch thick mat is perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises.

**Key Features:**

* **Extra-Thick Cushioning**: Our NBR foam construction provides superior grip and support for your joints, reducing the risk of injury and discomfort.
* **Soft and Gentle on Skin**: The soft-cushioned surface ensures a comfortable workout experience, even during prolonged sessions.
* **Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap**: Effortlessly carry your mat with our convenient strap, perfect for traveling or storing in your gym bag.

**Benefits:**

* Reduces joint stress and discomfort
* Provides superior grip and traction
* Soft and gentle on skin
* Easy to clean and maintain
* Perfect for yoga, Pilates, floor exercises, and more!

**Why Choose Gaiam Essentials?**

At Gaiam, we're committed to providing high-quality products that enhance your fitness journey. Our thick yoga mat is designed with comfort, support, and portability in mind.

Get ready to take your workout to the next level with our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap. Order now and experience the ultimate in comfort, support, and convenience!

**Dimensions for Maximum Versatility**

Measuring 72 inches long and 24 inches wide, this mat provides ample space for even the most expansive poses. Whether you're practicing yoga, Pilates, or simply enjoying some floor exercises, this mat has got you covered.
